Package edu.brown.cs.altsai.bacon

This is a package that contains the classes needed to find shortest bacon paths.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    An Actor represents a Node in a Graph, storing an actor's name, ID, associated actors, and the relationship with said actors (common films).
    CommandLineParser
    Parses command line arguments.
    Film
    A Film is a representation of an Edge in a Graph, storing a film's title, ID, weight (reciprocal of the number of actors starring in it), and the Actor it shares a relation with.
    GraphLoader
    GraphLoader has a path functionality that, using a given database file, can query and build a partial Graph, applying Dijkstra's algorithm as it progresses.
    GuiHandler
    Handles GUI functionality and interaction with a given database.
    Main
    Main class for Bacon.
    PathElement
    Contains a starting Actor, connecting Film, and target Actor.

Package edu.brown.cs.altsai.bacon Description

This is a package that contains the classes needed to find shortest bacon paths.
Author:
Alison Tsai
